com.compendium.core.datamodel
Class NodeCache

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.core.datamodel.NodeCache
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener
public class NodeCache
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.beans.PropertyChangeListener

This object store the nodes and views being used in the current session

Author:
Michelle Bachler

Method Detail

put

public boolean put(PCObject object)
Adds a node/view to the cache If the node/view is already present it increases its reference by one

Parameters:
PCObject - object, the NodeSummary or View to add to the cache.
Returns:
boolean, true if the object passed was successfully added (was a NodeSummary or View Object).

remove

public boolean remove(PCObject object)
Removes a node/view from the cache. If the node/view is already present it decreases its reference by one. If the referencecount goes to zero it removes it from the cache.

Parameters:
PCObject - object, the NodeSummary or View to remove from to the cache.
Returns:
boolean, true if the object passed was successfully removed (was a NodeSummary or View Object and was found).

replace

public boolean replace(PCObject oldObject,
                       PCObject newObject)
Replace the given oldObject with the given newObject.

Parameters:
PCObject - oldObject, the NodeSummary or View to replace in the cache.
PCObject - newObject, the NodeSummary or View to replace with in the cache.
Returns:
boolean, true if the object was replaced (was a NodeSummary or View Object and was found).

getCount

public int getCount(PCObject object)
Returns the number of references to the node/view else if no object found returns -1.

Parameters:
PCObject - object, the NodeSummary or View to get the reference count for.
Returns:
int, the count of the use of the node or view else -1.

getViews

public java.util.Enumeration getViews()
Returns a list of View objects in the cache.

Returns:
Enumeration, a list of the IView object help in the cache.

getNode

public NodeSummary getNode(java.lang.String sID)
Returns the node/view with the given id.

Returns:
NodeSummary, the node/view with the given id.

getNode

public NodeSummary getNode(NodeSummary oNode)
                    throws java.util.NoSuchElementException
This method is to be called by links to get the model's from and to nodeSummary to update themselves for property change events for from and to node changes. The method takes the id of the input nodeSummary and checks it against its own hashtable and then returns the nodeSummary with that id. If it does not exist it throws a NoSuchElement exception.

Parameters:
NodeSummary - oNode, the node for which the return the node with the same node id.
Returns:
NodeSummary with the same node id as the passed NodeSummary object.
Throws:
NoSuchElementException, - if a node with the same id as the passed node was node found.
java.util.NoSuchElementException

addNodes

public NodeSummary[] addNodes(NodeSummary[] oNodes)
This method updates the cache for an array of NodeSummary objects. For each NodeSummary object it calles addNode.

Parameters:
NodeSummary[] - oNodes, the array of nodes to add to the cache.
Returns:
NodeSummary[], an array of nodes added to the cache.

addNode

public NodeSummary addNode(NodeSummary oNode)
Adds a NodeSummary object to cache or, if already in the cache, increments its use count.

Parameters:
NodeSummary - oNode, the node to add to the cache.
Returns:
NodeSummary, the node added to the cache.

getView

public View getView(java.lang.String sID)
This method returns an View object with the given id, if the view is in the cache

Parameters:
String - sID, the id of the View to look for in the cache.
Returns:
View, the IView object with the given id if found, else null.

evt, - the associated PropertyChangeEvent to handle.

Clear the Cache.
